remarks: Projection of vector sum is sum of projections.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjidm.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjidm.2 $e |- A e. ~H $.
pjadj.3 $e |- B e. ~H $.
pjaddii $p |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( A +h B ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) $.
